name: Kalyan Kumar
text: Rude and Unprofessional Staff. The food is bad. Served under cooked and cold bread sticks. When confronted about the quality of food, the staff asked us to wait for half an hour to process the refund. Not visiting this restaurant chain again.

name: Giridhar Bolla
text: Good place. Veggie pizza is available

name: Khadija Loume
text: The food is microwave please!!!!!! I told them I don't eat microwave food and they serve me again a cold pasta. I eat two time on it and I throw it away it was nasty. And the employes are so rude my GOD !!!!!!!!!!

name: Andrea Blauert
text: My family and I had lunch here today and it was good. We ordered the Stromboli w/ salad, and my boys had the kids meal with pizza. I liked how they heat up your food in the stone pizza oven after you order. The salad and fresh fruit choices …More

name: Mark Esslinger
text: My daughter had some pizza here that I thought the sauce was not really good at all.

name: Laurencio Ronquillo
text: Can never go wrong with them. Commercial but with good taste and decent value quick Italian. A bit disappointing I did not see lasagna that I think they have in some other branches. But very flavorful and good options.

name: Rayette Peltier
text: Decently priced and the food is alright. I recommend the baked ziti with sauce. I feel like it's the biggest bang for your buck and the customer service is great!

name: Kelsey Christiansen
text: The price is decent, food is not very flavorful but not terrible. The cashier was extremely nice but the man actually helping me seemed to be more interested in reprimanding another staff in front of customers.

name: Matthew Gantz
text: Stop #159 for @pizzas365: Villa Italia Kitchen gives you a large quantity of poor quality pizza for the price. Boring, stale crust with plastic-tasting pepperonis on top of an average sauce. 2.2 Stars.

name: Chang Zhang
text: The staff was EXTREMELY ARROGANT AND RUDE!!! I have lived in twin cities for 4 years and never experienced such terrible service before. Would not recommend this place.

name: Giovanni Luciano
text: Pretty darn good slice of pizza when compared to mall food joints.

name: Jeff Laping
text: Delicious and great value!

name: Matthew Jones
text: The food was not very good.

name: David Smith
text: Cleaned kitchen hoods

name: Luckiekabo Vangyang
text: Plenty of food prepped and staff was fast and friendly.

name: VICKEY D WILLIAMS
text: Great taste

name: Marcus König
text: Good or bad as all Villa Italien kitchen

name: Rahim Virani
text: Overcharging customers .. very rude staff ... very unprofessional.. avoid this place

name: Miguel Rodriguez
text: Came in on a Thursday morning - very friendly staff.

name: علي العامري
text:
(Translated by Google) Sea Food روووعة.

(Original)
الاكلات البحرية روووعة ❤

name: octavio carreiro
text:
(Translated by Google) Another fantastic place

(Original)
Outro lugar fantástico
